German Language Course Online for Beginners

  • Why learn online German course?
  • Ways to Learn German
  • How long does learning German take?
  • Similarities between the German and the English language
  • Conclusion

Destinex provides German language course online for beginners where you can learn the foundation of the spoken German language, from basic grammar to essential vocabulary, using simple text & audio. We provide training of online German course that include German language sentence structure and conversational dialogues to more advanced German vocabulary and phrases. German language classes online include:

  • German grammar and vocabulary exercises
  • More than 900-hour interactive online German course
  • Exercises are structured as per the European framework of reference for languages
  • Experts will answer your questions
  • Provide clear explanations for each grammar point
{/* */}

Why learn online German course?

There are various benefits to learn online German course such as:

  • You can build new connections with millions of people across the world
  • You can get a leg up in learning about other related languages including English
  • You can experience the culture and history of the German-speaking world
  • You can make your German business skills that assist you to compete in the global economy
  • You can travel to and even live in German-speaking countries with confidence

Ways to Learn German

Learning German in the classroom

German is among some of the most studied languages in school systems and universities around the world. Classroom learning is the most popular option for beginners in grade school or university. It enables more intensive, regular study with feedback from teachers who know the language and can correct mistakes as they happen and teach content in an interactive way.

Online German course

It is the best way to learn German. Destinex has expert-designed online German course at an affordable price. You can learn on your own time and are often more interactive and engaging than various free courses and resources. We constantly updated with new, fresh material, so you can get the most relevant learning experience available.

Learn German at home

There are various ways to learn German at home such as German media, apps, and online German course by Destinex that enable you to practice German wherever and whenever. It’s easy to take German language classes online from any device such as smartphones, tab, and PC.

How long does learning German take?

Learning a new language may take a different time depending on various factors such as your prior experience and exposure to the language, how much work you put into the learning process, motivation, and more. Learning online German course for beginners takes around 36 weeks.

In Destinex German language classes online, you can learn the basics of vocabulary, grammar, and pronunciation with ease in short duration. Learning the German language depends on how often you practice, how well equipped you are to learn. If you practice on a daily basis for at least 3 to 6 months, you can able to handle a daily conversation with German people.

Similarities between the German and the English language

English and German share a common language ancestor. Both these languages are part of the same linguistic family known as the West Germanic languages. English shares much of its grammar and syntax, or sentence structure with German.

An English speaker has some benefits when it comes to learning online German course, especially many of the words that sound the same in both languages. However, learning German is difficult even for English speakers due to tricky words, the pronunciation. You can build your skills to speak German fluently effortlessly with Destinex.

Conclusion

After learning online German course, opens you up to a better understanding of the language itself and also of the arts and culture of the world that speaks it. Learning to speak German fluently is an exercise in patience and practice. Destinex makes you expert to speak the German language well. It takes time and effort, and you won’t get without making a few mistakes along the way. So start learning online German course and expand your language skills now!
